subject: Can't afford drugs you need
body:
Dear valued member.
Read this special pharmacy bulletin from the leading Canadian on-line drug store. 
High quality Canadian products for the price lower than for American drugs.Visit now. You have a chance to receive a Summer discount.
Click here to checkhttp://bymonth.hk
Strict confidentiality is guaranteed.We are proud of our experienced and professional team, prompt service and safe delivery.
Yours faithfully,Freida Barrow
